verbose_text: The floating times in the FST were significantly decreased (P < 0.01; XREF_FIG) and sucrose consumption was significantly increased (P < 0.01; XREF_FIG) in the hyperforin treated post-stroke SI mice compared with the NS treated post-stroke SI mice at 14 dpi.
evidence: sucrose consumption was significantly increased (P<0.01;  XREF_FIG ) in the hyperforin
